This site uses the free and open source Gridea as a template and is hosted on GitHub for personal, non-commercial use only, to document the daily life of programmers.

ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Who is the blogger

Jeremy Wu, male, September 1989, working in software development, currently working in IIE as a software development manager position. Passionate about Microsoft technology stack and open source. My technical contributions are mainly hosted on cnblog and GitHub, welcome to read, re-post, comment and subscribe, thanks.
